item.description:
A two day workshop. Part one takes place Sunday, January 9th and part two takes place Sunday, January 16th.

Find your inner abstract artist. Kim Abraham will lead an abstract drawing and painting workshop. You can sign up for either one or for both. Cost for one workshop is $15. Cost for both workshops is $25.00.

Abstract Art Explosion Returns - Part 1. This workshop is based on the abstract art workshop presented at this year's retreat except with new materials and techniques for those who already participated. Explore abstract art through drawing, composition, and painting with acrylics on yupo paper. Experiment with different gel mediums to add texture and depth to your works. Go home with an single abstract painting ready for framing (after it dries of course.)


All materials supplied.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Abstract Art Explosion Returns - Part 1
